description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

You’ve learned to transform your nanites into basic vehicles to help you maneuver various terrain. When you use your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{gear array} to take a major form, you can use a nanite surge to instead form your nanites into a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Item.XLAUrMQtLPSWI0Mr]{basic enercycle} that only you can ride. This otherwise follows the standard rules for your gear array. At 10th level, you can form your nanites into a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Item.yqP5U8sJWh6YoIZy]{torpedo minisub}, and at 14th level, you can form your nanites into an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Item.lTHM5IG2AKhOCC7v]{ultralight turboglider} (Armory 139). Regardless of the form, these vehicles offer no cover, can’t carry passengers, have no hardness, deal no collision damage, and have 1 HP.
